problem.question: To open a tight jar lid, you should:
options: Run hot water over the lid for a minute to expand the metal, then twist open.
Run cold water over the lid for a minute to contract the metal, then twist open.

key_steps: Thermal expansion: materials expand when heated
Metal lid expands more than glass jar when heated
Expansion loosens the seal between lid and jar
Cold water would contract lid, making it tighter

constraints.description: Materials expand with heat, contract with cold
Different materials have different expansion rates

logic_requirements: Correctly identifies heating as loosening mechanism
